title: Writing the Matrix
text: Each row corresponds to an equation, and the fourth column is separated by the equal sign. We have: $$x-y+2z=3$$, $$2x+y-2z=1$$, $$4x-y+2z=0$$
speech: Each row corresponds to an equation, and the fourth column is separated by the equal sign. We have:  x minus y plus 2 z is equal to 3 ,  2 x, plus y minus 2 z is equal to 1 ,  4 x, minus y plus 2 z is equal to 0
pacedSpeech: Each row corresponds to an equation, and the fourth column is separated by the equal sign. We have:   x minus y plus 2 z is equal to 3
,   2 x, plus y minus 2 z is equal to 1
,   4 x, minus y plus 2 z is equal to 0
